select ss.id,so.name as organization_name,su.actual_name as name,su.sex,su.tel,ss.wage_card_number,ss.salary from sys_salary as ss,sys_organization as so,sys_user as su
ss.train_person = su.id and ss.organization_id = so.id
and ss.organization_id = #{organizationId}
and su.tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
and ss.wage_card_number like concat('%',#{wageCardNumber},'%')
order by ss.create_date desc
